text:
Gwen is a writer, reader, hockey fan, concert goer, and lunchtime enthusiast.

What do you think of when someone mentions John Stamos?

I always associate him with Full House, my favorite show growing up.

Advertisement

I used to stay up all night to catch it, and I can safely say I’ve seen every episode at least twice.

But, of course, the heartthrob is known as more than just Uncle Jesse.

John Stamos has shown off his acting skills in shows like General Hospital, Dreams, and, more recently, Grandfathered and Scream Queens.

On August 19, 2017, John turned 54 years old.

To celebrate his special day, the actor and musician posted to Instagram. He thanked all his followers for their sweet birthday wishes and gave them a little gift himself.

Advertisement

John, spending his special day in a lush paradise, bared it all for his 2 million Instagram followers.

Keep scrolling to see some of John’s best moments and the — er — intimate photo he shared for his birthday!

Thumbnail Photo: Instagram / JohnStamos
title: John Stamos Celebrates 54th Birthday, Shares Photo Of Himself Showering Naked Online
